Articles.Content:
Hello!

As the title says i cant find parts from the mod Extraplanetary Launchpads in my ksp game.

I cant find the launchpads neither in the VAB or in the Tech Tree.

these are my installed mods in ckan 

[x] Science! Continued (xScienceContinued 6.0.2)
AIES Aerospace (AIESAerospace-Unofficial 1.6.1-patched)

IIRC 

Custom Community Categories causes this to happen. I think there is a patch that will correct the problem but am not sure.

1 hour ago, Fizzlebop Smith said:

IIRC 

Custom Community Categories causes this to happen. I think there is a patch that will correct the problem but am not sure. 

do you know where i can get the patch? i´ve tried everything and nothing works, also i didnt find anyone else with the same problem

Ive been trying to determine if it is related to the Community Categories Kit , but I think my memory is failing me,

Do you have the specific filter CCK-no duplicates installed? I seem to remember this was the one causing me trouble.

It used to cause some issues, but reading the thread seems to suggest most of the more common problems have been resolved. 

I remember being unable to manually search but was able to find the part in the associated extension filter.
Adding the various filter extensions allows a sub directory of parts to open with filters like manufacturer, resource, misc... the parts were lumped into a generic one i believe.

I created my own category through the in game UI option for filter extensions and added the various missing parts from the from community 

I am wondering if it something to do with EL tags not being well defined. This is usually the case when parts mods dont work for the CCK. 

The community parts titles thread i linked above and 
 


are active threads. Try taking your question to one of these and im sure there will be more eyes crossing over it. You will probably get a good answer. If it requires writing a specific patch some one on one of these will be able to whip one up (probably) in a spoiler window and set you straight.

Im not certain this is the case, but know asking the question again in one of those threads will work. 
This is also relatively new at 5 hours and will have someone better than me to help. 

Sorry, i tried skimming through the EP launch thread but am running out of time.

 

Edited June 28 by Fizzlebop Smith

the Filter Extensions one.. let's you add whatever part you want to custom tabs

 

Edited June 28 by Fizzlebop Smith
